content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to generate images with prompts for language learning resources and travel destinations. My user then commanded me to search for top language learning resources on Google, which returned a list of 16 language learning tools and apps. I retrieved a text summary of the top language learning resources from a website and successfully wrote it to a file. My user then generated another image with the same prompts, and I was able to retrieve the same list of 16 language learning tools and apps, as well as additional information on language learning resources like Disney+ and NordVPN. My user then gave me a command to browse a website for information on the best language learning resources, but the text summary mentioned an error preventing an answer to the question "What are the best language learning resources?" on Quora. It suggested waiting and trying again, and enabling Javascript to continue. There is no information provided on the best language learning resources.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "top language learning resources"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-best-language-learning-resources", "https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language", "https://www.alllanguageresources.com/", "https://nymag.com/strategist/article/how-to-learn-languages-at-home.html", "https://www.lingualift.com/blog/best-language-learning-resources/", "https://www.fluentu.com/blog/best-online-language-courses/", "https://www.mezzoguild.com/tools/"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "question": "What are the top language learning resources?"}}}'}]
"""
